overview: Girlfriends Films presents the 11th volume to the series “Lesbian Legal”. The feature-length adult film follows the story of an accused killer (Carter Cruise) who runs away upon finding the body of the victim, her lesbian lover (Quinn Wilde). Cruise calls on “Lesbian Legal” defense attorney Prinzzess to battle her case against shrewd but sexy district attorney India Summer. To win this complex case Prinzzess enlists the help of expert (and former lover) Jasmine Jae to examine the blood evidence and warm up to the icy DA, India Summer in the hopes of setting their client free.
tagline: Legal and ready for drama. Simply the most realistic sex in lesbian adult video.
title: Lesbian Legal 11
